About me







Welcome to my personal website! I am neuroscientist, digital
illustrator, sketch artist, and a Postdoctoral fellow at Italian
Institute of Technology in the Brain Disease and Development Department.
I study neurodevelopmental disorder, down syndrome with a focus on
multi-omics analysis and human induced pluripotent stem cells.
